content.query:
CREATE VIEW account

AS

SELECT
  C1.Id
 ,C1.SinkCreatedOn
 ,C1.SinkModifiedOn
 ,C1.statecode
 ,C1.statuscode
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.ts_primarysecondaryfocus AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.ts_primarysecondaryfocus AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.ts_primarysecondaryfocus AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.ts_primarysecondaryfocus AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS ts_primarysecondaryfocus
 ,C1.customertypecode
 ,C1.address1_addresstypecode
 ,C1.accountclassificationcode
 ,C1.ts_easeofworking
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.ts_ukrow AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.ts_ukrow AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.ts_ukrow AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.ts_ukrow AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS ts_ukrow
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.preferredappointmenttimecode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.preferredappointmenttimecode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.preferredappointmenttimecode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.preferredappointmenttimecode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS preferredappointmenttimecode
 ,C1.ts_address1addresstype
 ,C1.xpd_relationshipstatus
 ,C1.ts_relationship
 ,C1.xpd_remindermonths
 ,C1.ts_importance
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.address2_freighttermscode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.address2_freighttermscode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.address2_freighttermscode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.address2_freighttermscode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS address2_freighttermscode
 ,C1.ts_irrvsmomperformancemeasure
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.ts_introducertype AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.ts_introducertype AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.ts_introducertype AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.ts_introducertype AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS ts_introducertype
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.accountcategorycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.accountcategorycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.accountcategorycode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.accountcategorycode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS accountcategorycode
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.paymenttermscode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.paymenttermscode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.paymenttermscode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.paymenttermscode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS paymenttermscode
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.preferredappointmentdaycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.preferredappointmentdaycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.preferredappointmentdaycode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.preferredappointmentdaycode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS preferredappointmentdaycode
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.businesstypecode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.businesstypecode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.businesstypecode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.businesstypecode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS businesstypecode
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.industrycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.industrycode AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.industrycode AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.industrycode AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS industrycode
 ,C1.ts_sizeoffirm
 ,C1.ts_interaction
 ,C1.address1_shippingmethodcode
 ,C1.ts_portfoliocompanystatus
 ,C1.customersizecode
 ,C1.xpd_previousinvestorstatus
 ,C1.ts_recommendationoffirm
 ,C1.preferredcontactmethodcode
 ,C1.accountratingcode
 ,C1.ts_investorstatus
 ,C1.ts_capabilitiesoffirm
 ,C1.mpe_flowlastrunoutcome
 ,C1.address2_addresstypecode
 ,C1.address2_shippingmethodcode
 ,C1.ts_nextoriginationmeetingarranged
 ,C1.ownershipcode
 ,C1.territorycode
 ,C1.ts_investortype
 ,C1.shippingmethodcode
 ,C1.ts_investorregion
 ,C1.address1_freighttermscode
 ,C1.xpd_function
 ,C1.ts_quickcaptureuses
 ,C1.xpd_montagulevel
 ,C1.ts_permanentinterim
 ,C1.ts_quickcapturesectors
 ,C1.ts_roletypes
 ,C1.ts_companytype
 ,C1.xpd_level
 ,C1.ts_indicativeclientbase
 ,C1.xpd_specialisms
 ,C1.ts_vendorsummary
 ,C1.ts_producttype
 ,C1.ts_montaguoffice
 ,C1.ts_quickcapturegeography
 ,C1.xpd_roletypes
 ,C1.mpe_livedeal
 ,C1.donotbulkpostalmail
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.donotpostalmail AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.donotpostalmail AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.donotpostalmail AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.donotpostalmail AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS donotpostalmail
 ,C1.msdyn_gdproptout
 ,C1.ts_organisationalchange
 ,C1.xpd_publictoprivatetracker
 ,C1.ts_auditor
 ,C1.donotsendmm
 ,C1.donotbulkemail
 ,C1.followemail
 ,C1.creditonhold
 ,C1.marketingonly
 ,C1.participatesinworkflow
 ,C1.merged
 ,C1.ts_validated
 ,C1.xpd_sharepointlocationcreated
 ,C1.xpd_setreminder
 ,C1.ts_personnelchange
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.donotfax AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.donotfax AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.donotfax AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.donotfax AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS donotfax
 ,C1.isprivate
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.donotphone AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.donotphone AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.donotphone AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.donotphone AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS donotphone
 ,C1.xpd_rpo
 ,C1.ts_trackcompany
 ,CASE
    WHEN ISNULL(CAST(C1.donotemail AS VARCHAR(50)), '') <> ISNULL(CAST(C2.donotemail AS VARCHAR(50)), '') THEN CAST(C2.donotemail AS VARCHAR(50))
    ELSE CAST(C1.donotemail AS VARCHAR(50))
  END AS donotemail
 ,C1.parentaccountid
 ,C1.parentaccountid_entitytype
 ,C1.ts_recommendedby
 ,C1.ts_recommendedby_entitytype
 ,C1.ts_countryofeconomicoriginforthecapital
 ,C1.ts_countryofeconomicoriginforthecapital_entitytype
 ,C1.xpd_reminderto
 ,C1.xpd_reminderto_entitytype
 ,C1.preferredserviceid
 ,C1.preferredserviceid_entitytype
 ,C1.msdyn_segmentid
 ,C1.msdyn_segmentid_entitytype
 ,C1.owningbusinessunit
 ,C1.owningbusinessunit_entitytype
 ,C1.createdbyexternalparty
 ,C1.createdbyexternalparty_entitytype
 ,C1.ts_validatedby
 ,C1.ts_validatedby_entitytype
 ,C1.modifiedonbehalfby
 ,C1.modifiedonbehalfby_entitytype
 ,C1.transactioncurrencyid
 ,C1.transactioncurrencyid_entitytype
 ,C1.ts_primarymperelationshipmanager
 ,C1.ts_primarymperelationshipmanager_entitytype
 ,C1.modifiedbyexternalparty
 ,C1.modifiedbyexternalparty_entitytype
 ,C1.ts_headofficeid

 ,C1.ts_address1usstate

 ,C1.slaid

 ,C1.originatingleadid

 ,C1.masterid

 ,C1.ts_originationlead1

 ,C1.xpd_totalinstitutionalcommitments
 ,C1.aging30
 ,C1.creditlimit
